Summon Units:#1889 Jade Serpent
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The Jade Serpent is an enormous serpent crowned with a feathery plumage. It is only found in the forests of Mictlan. It is sacred and can inspire nearby soldiers to great deeds.
